"Allen wake up we've shrunken more." The little girl shouts to her brother, who's only go to her waist.
Slowly he's waking up, screaming in shock as he see's his surroundings.
Both of the tiny naked kids walk more in the open of the room. "How do we look how big we are?" Alice
asks herself, just as she spots the solution. An old plastic ruler is lying near the siblings, both of them are losing no
time, running through the carpet in direction of it. Since Alice is bigger she's the first who arrives, she almost can't believe it
how big this thing is. She lies down next to it, realizing that she's 10 inches tall, your tiny brother measures only 4.5 inches.
"We are small as toys Allen, it's so cool how big everything is." Alice tells her brother,
"I'm scared, you are so big, all your clothes are like little mountains. Let's go somewhere safer." Allen answers.
Alice looks around for an idea as two things are coming too mind.
1133321111.title: A huge shrinking spurt

choices: The tiny boy starts to turn her on
11333211111.content:
"We should go in my dollhouse, I always wanted to do that and we can hide inside." Says Alice in direction of her
tiny brother. She starts to drag the giant plastic ruler with her, just to know how small they get.
It's no long way and to their luck Alice is sill big enough to open the door, so both of them
enter. Everything looks surreal pink and the plastic floor feels cold on their tiny feet.
The Barbie dolls are still a little bigger than Alice and almost gigantic for the even smaller boy.

As they enter the living room Allen feels the familiar tingle as his shrinking speeds up.
"Oh no, whats happening." Allen shrieks as he sees his sister growing before him.
"You're shrinking again, you get really tiny." As Alice finishes her sentence her
brother shrinks past her knees. After a few moments he stops, from your point
your brother is around a foot tall.
"Look how small you got, you look like a doll to me." She says as she
picks him up and set him on a table.
11333211111.title: Her Dollhouse

choices: Since no one is at home it will be her.
113332222.content: It´s your little sister Emily.

12.title: Character

info.brief_description: You are either a 7 year old boy or girl that suddenly start to shrink smaller and smaller.
info.description:
You are either 7 year old Chris, or 7 year old Emma. One day (your parents are away) a flash of light blinds you and you slowly start to shrink. But the shrinking doesn`t stop.
